common.unauthorized: Sign in or authentication is required
common.credential_invalid: Client id or secret is invalid
common.token_invalid: The login is invalid: You might have exceeded the validity time after signing in, or you're signing in with the same account from a different browser.
common.forbidden: An attempt was made to access an unauthorized resource
common.out_of_range: The value exceeded the specified range({{range}}).
common.too_big: The value exceeded the specified limit ({{limit}}).
common.not_found: The resource could not be found

order.state_change_failed_return: Orders in the process of being returned cannot be changed to {{target}} state.
order.state_change_failed_volume: Changing from {{current}} to {{target}} is failed with invalid volume data.
order.state_change_failed_seller: Changing from {{current}} to {{target}} is failed with missing seller volume weight unit error.
order.state_change_failed_master: Changing from {{current}} to {{target}} is failed with missing master info.
order.state_change_failed_unknown: Changing from {{current}} to {{target}} is undefined transition.
order.modification_forbidden: Can't modify the order because of the current state ({{state}}).
order.invalid_id_or_code: The order ID or code is incorrect.
order.invalid_state: The state of a order is incorrect.
order.merge_not_found: No orders are eligible for order combining.
order.currency_mismatch: The currency of the order information is different from the currency of the ordered products.

signup.conflict: Same name or number is already exist.

user.locked: Account is locked. Please contact user system administrator to unlock
user.waiting: Account is waiting. Please contact user system administrator to unlock

code.used: This is the code you've already used.

cbt.nation_code_mismatch: The order has a different country code than the master's.

signup.notification: [{{hostname}}] A new seller({{name}}) has applied to join.

password_reset.request: [{{hostname}}] Reset your ICS Logistics password for {{name}}
password_reset.notification: [{{hostname}}] Your ICS Logistics Account password has been reset
